name: tm28
effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user drains the target’s blood. The user’s HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack. This may also burn, freeze, or paralyze the target.
